plot: In a late night card game, an unlikely cast of characters square off over "a pile of cash, a crappy watch, and one goddam key." A wild ride ensues.
title: Little Minx Exquisite Corpse: Waffles for Breakfast
plot_es: In a late night card game, an unlikely cast of characters square off over "a pile of cash, a crappy watch, and one goddam key." A wild ride ensues.
original_name: Little Minx Exquisite Corpse: Waffles for Breakfast
